title: #231 - Jane Lin, Mother, Architect, Urban Designer, Founder of Urban Field Studio

description:

itunes:subtitle: Jane shares a presentation of her work and her story of raising two children while work in the profess of architecture and urban design
itunes:author: David Lee and Marina Bourderonnet
